contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox musical artist | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject Musicians --> | name = Zeeshan Parwez | image = File:Zusa.jpg | caption = Live @ Irving Arts Center, Dallas (Texas), USA | image_size = 250 | landscape = yes | background = group_or_band | genre = [[Electronica]], [[Alternative rock|Alternative]], [[Ambient music|Ambient]] | origin = [[Peshawar]], [[Khyber Pakhtunkhwa]], [[Pakistan]] | years_active = 2001–present | website = [http://www.sajidandzeeshan.com/ www.sajidandzeeshan.com] | associated_acts = [[Coke Studio (Pakistan)|Coke Studio]], [[Mizraab]], [[Ali Azmat]], [[Atif Aslam]], [[Sarmad Ghafoor]] }} '''Zeeshan Parwez''' ([[Urdu]]: '''ذیشان پرویز''') is a Pakistani Music Artist.<ref>{{cite news |title=Music concert rocks Peshawar youth |url=http://www.dawn.com/2011/03/21/music-concert-rocks-peshawar-youth.html |work=[[Dawn (newspaper)|Dawn]] |date=21 March 2011 |accessdate=13 June 2011 }}</ref><ref>{{cite news |title=In the loop: Music for the youth, by (kind of) youth |url=http://www.dawn.com/2011/02/06/in-the-loop-music-for-the-youth-by-kind-of-youth.html |work=[[Dawn (newspaper)|Dawn]] |date=6 February 2011 |accessdate=13 June 2011 }}</ref><ref>{{cite news |title=Fight the flood: Rock-and-roll out to save the world |url=http://www.dawn.com/2010/09/05/fight-the-flood-rock-and-roll-out-to-save-the-world.html |work=[[Dawn (newspaper)|Dawn]] |date=5 September 2010 |accessdate=13 June 2011 }}</ref> Zeeshan Parwez is a filmmaker / music producer based in [[Peshawar]], [[Pakistan]] and he has been responsible for producing tracks for a couple of underground bands and some mainstream artists. [[File:Sajidandzeeshan-live.jpg|thumbnail|Sajid & Zeeshan performing live at a concert. Visible from left to right are; Zeeshan Parwez and Sajid Ghafoor]] He is primarily involved with his band "[[Sajid and Zeeshan]]" and he has produced two full length albums titled “One Light Year At Snail Speed” and "The Harvest". He is also the founder of a post production / music studio, Zeepar Studios in [[Peshawar]], established in 2004. Since then, he’s been busy making music videos, documentaries, movies for educational institutions and creating music. Zeeshan has been the video producer for [[Coke Studio]] Seasons 2,3 and 4 and Director for [[Ufone]] [[Uth Records]]. He has directed videos for many mainstream artists like [[Ali Azmat]] and [[Mekaal Hasan Band]]. Zeeshan Parwez is also a session player and plays live keyboards and synths for [[Ali Azmat]], [[Atif Aslam]] and many other artists. == Singles == *King Of Self *Freestyle Dive *My Happiness *Have To Let Go Sometimes *Start With A Scratch *Walk On Air *Sanity == Albums == *One Light Year At Snail Speed (August, 2006) *The Harvest (December 2011) == See also== *[[Ali Azmat]] *[[Atish Raj]] *[[Nadeem F. Paracha]] *[[Fasi Zaka]] *[[Sajid Ghafoor]] *[[Jehangir Aziz Hayat]] ==References== {{reflist}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Parwez, Zeeshan | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Parwez, Zeeshan}} [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Pashtun people]] [[Category:Pakistani singers]] [[Category:Coke Studio (Pakistan) artists]] [[Category:People from Peshawar]] [[Category:University of Peshawar alumni]] [[Category:Pakistani rock keyboardists]]
